38 #include <moveit/task_constructor/stages/current_state.h>
39 #include <moveit/task_constructor/storage.h>
40 #include <moveit_msgs/GetPlanningScene.h>
41 #include <moveit_msgs/PlanningSceneComponents.h>
42 #include <moveit/planning_scene/planning_scene.h>
43 #include <moveit/robot_model_loader/robot_model_loader.h>
44 #include <ros/ros.h>

46 namespace moveit {
47 namespace task_constructor {
48 namespace stages {
49 
50 CurrentState::CurrentState(const std::string& name) : Generator(name) {
51  auto& p = properties();
52  Property& timeout = p.property("timeout");
53  timeout.setDescription("max time to wait for get_planning_scene service");
54  timeout.setValue(-1.0);
55 }
56 
57 void CurrentState::init(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
58  Generator::init(robot_model);
59  robot_model_ = robot_model;
60  scene_.reset();
61 }
62 
63 bool CurrentState::canCompute() const {
64  return !scene_;
65 }
66 
67 void CurrentState::compute() {
68  scene_ = std::make_shared<planning_scene::PlanningScene>(robot_model_);
69 
70  ros::NodeHandle h;
71  ros::ServiceClient client = h.serviceClient<moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene>("get_planning_scene");
72 
73  ros::Duration timeout(this->timeout());
74  if (client.waitForExistence(timeout)) {
75  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Request req;
76  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Response res;
77 
78  req.components.components =
79  moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::SCENE_SETTINGS | moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::ROBOT_STATE |
80  moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::ROBOT_STATE_ATTACHED_OBJECTS |
81  moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::WORLD_OBJECT_NAMES |
82  moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::WORLD_OBJECT_GEOMETRY | moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::OCTOMAP |
83  moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::TRANSFORMS |
84  moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::ALLOWED_COLLISION_MATRIX |
85  moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::LINK_PADDING_AND_SCALING |
86  moveit_msgs::PlanningSceneComponents::OBJECT_COLORS;
87 
88  if (client.call(req, res)) {
89  scene_->setPlanningSceneMsg(res.scene);
90  spawn(InterfaceState(scene_), 0.0);
91  return;
92  }
93  }
94  ROS_WARN("failed to acquire current PlanningScene");
95 }
96 } // namespace stages
97 } // namespace task_constructor
98 } // namespace moveit
